WRITING.TITLE: Doesn't believe I'm a lesbian
WRITING.TEXT:
My partner who i am married too for the past year and been together for 2 still doesn't believe i am a lesbian like seriously. She states i cant be a lesbian because she never got the vibe off of me and she is very good at picking out who is gay and who isn't. Her second reason is that before i came out when i was 16 i dated men and had sex with men then i started dating woman and have ever since. also says that if we get devorced i will go back to dating guys ( I won't)
so to summarize i am not a lesbian because i dated guys when i was a teen before i came out even thou i am married to a woman and have been dating girls since i was 16.
